description: Biobank, collection or network also exists in …

label: ID
description: Unique ID.

label: Name of the System
description: Name of the source in which the biobank, collection or network also exists.

label: Persistent Identifier
description: Persistent Identifier of the biobank, collection or network in the other source.

label: URL
description: Link to the biobank, collection or network in the other source.
Description of the biobank organisation, like name, location, network, contact person, collaboration opportunities and quality assessments.

label: ID
description: Unique biobank ID within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 + underscore + biobank national ID or name), prefixed with bbmri-eric:ID: string - MIABIS-2.0-01.

label: Name
description: Biobank name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-03.

label: Acronym
description: Biobank acronym - MIABIS-2.0-02.

label: Description
description: Biobank description - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: URL
description: Biobank URL - MIABIS-2.0-04.

label: Location
description: The city where the biobank is located.

label: Country
description: Country hosting the biobank according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-06.

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Head of the Biobank
description: Person in charge of the biobank.

label: Contact Person
description: Contact person of the biobank.

label: Juridical Person
description: Juristic person of a biobank according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-05.

label: Networks
description: Reference to a biobank network ID, to which the biobank belongs; this attribute can also be used for biobank network, where it refers to the superior biobank network.

label: Also Known In
description: The biobank also exists in …

label: Collections
description: Collections belonging to the biobank.

label: Services
description: Capabilities and services that the biobank organisation can offer to a researcher.

label: Commercial Collaboration
description: The biobank can be used for collaboration with commercial partners.

label: Non-for-profit Collaboration
description: The biobank can be used for collaboration with non-for-profit partners.

label: Withdrawn
description: This biobank is withdrawn from the Directory.
Collection Facts

label: ID
description: Unique ID of the fact.

label: Collection ID
description: ID of the collection where the fact belongs to.

label: Sex
description: The sex of the individuals in the fact. Can be one of the following values: Male, Female, Unknown, Undifferrentiated, Not applicable.

label: Age Range
description: Age range of the sample donors at time of sample donation.

label: Sample Type
description: The biospecimen saved from a biological entity for propagation e.g. testing, diagnostics, treatment or research purposes.

label: Disease
description: The disease or disease category of main interest in the fact, if any.

label: NumberOfSamples
description: Number of samples.

label: NumberOfDonors
description: Number of donors.

label: Date of Last Update
description: The date the fact information was last updated in the source system.
Description of the data and samples collected within a biobank, collections may be divided in sub-collections.

label: Descriptives
description: Collection Descriptives

label: ID
description: Unique collection ID within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard, constructed from biobankID prefix + :collection: + local collection ID string - MIABIS-2.0-01.
validation: if(!/^bbmri-eric:ID:[\\w-]+_[\\w-]+:collection:[\\w-:]+$/.test(id))'ID should start with the ID of the biobank in which the collection resides + :collection: => f.e bbmri-eric:ID:{NationalNodeCode}_biobank1:collection:AA1'

label: Name
description: Collection name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-03.

label: Acronym
description: Collection acronym according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-02.

label: Description
description: Collection description according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: URL
description: Collection URL - MIABIS-2.0-04.

label: Location
description: The city where the collection is located.

label: Country
description: Country according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-H.

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the collection in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the collection in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Head of the Collection
description: Person in charge of the collection.

label: Contact Person
description: Contact person of the collection.

label: Withdrawn
description: This collection is withdrawn from the Directory.

label: Belongs to
description: The collection belongs to ...

label: Parent Collection
description: Reference to a collection ID, refers to the superior collection.

label: Sub Collections
description: Reference to a collection ID, refers to one or more sub-collections.

label: Biobank
description: Reference to a biobank ID, to which the collection belongs.

label: Network
description: Reference to a network ID, to which the collection belongs to.

label: Also Known In
description: The collection also exists in …

label: Studies
description: A link to studies during which the collection was generated

label: Characteristics
description: Collection Characteristics

label: Collection Types
description: Type(s) of the collection - MIABIS-2.0-19.

label: Data Categories
description: Denotes which types of data are available (MIABIS-2.0-13).

label: Order of Magnitude
description: Size of the collection measured as 10n samples.

label: Size
description: Exact size of the collection at the given date.

label: Timestamp
description: Date to which the size of the collection was valid, format: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss+nnnn, e.g. 2016-11-15T09:53:13+0100.

label: Donor Data
description: Donor Data Characteristics

label: Number of Donors
description: Number of donors from who sample(s) were taken.

label: Order of Magnitude Donors
description: Size of the collection donors measured as 10n samples.

label: Sex Types
description: The sex type(s) of the individuals in the sample collection. - MIABIS-2.0-09.

label: Available Diagnoses
description: Available diagnosi(e)s in the collection, with the ontology prefix, possibly using * and ? wildcards, and prefix notation to denote diagnosis nomenclature - so far urn:miriam:icd: prefix for ICD-10, and urn:miriam:snomedct: prefix for SNOMED CT (examples being urn:miriam:icd:C*, urn:miriam:snomedct:25*) - MIABIS-2.0-17, adapted.

label: Age Low
description: Age of youngest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-10.

label: Age High
description: Age of oldest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-11.

label: Age Unit
description: Unit defining Age Low and Age High. Can be one of the following values: YEAR, MONTH, WEEK, DAY - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: Facts
description: Collection facts.

label: Sample Data
description: Sample Data Characteristics

label: Materials
description: Collection contains material(s) of this/these type(s) (MIABIS-2.0-14).

label: Storage Temperatures
description: Sample storage temperature(s) - SPREC 2.0 (MIABIS-2.0-15).

label: Imaging Data
description: Imaging Data Characteristics

label: Body Parts Examined
description: The examined body part(s).

label: Imaging Modalities
description: Imaging modality/modalities.

label: Image Dataset Types
description: Type(s) of the imaging dataset.

label: Policies
description: Policies belonging to the collection.

label: Commercial Collaboration
description: The collection can be used for collaboration with commercial partners.

label: Non-for-profit Collaboration
description: The collection can be used for collaboration with non-for-profit partners.

label: Data Use Ontologies
description: Data Use Ontologies (DUO)

label: DUC profile
description: Link to the Digital Use Conditions (DUC) profile

label: Fee-based access to
description: Denotes whether access to samples, data or images may be obtained on fee-based basis.

label: Access via Join Projects to
description: Denotes whether access to samples, data or images may be obtained on joint project basis.

label: Access Description
description: Short description of the access rules.

label: Access URI
description: URI describing the access policy.

label: PD/SOPs
description: Availability of Process Descriptions (PDs) and/or Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).
Description of the biobank and collection networks, like name, contact information and all kinds of common agreements (access policies, charters, sops).

label: ID
description: Unique ID the network within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 +underscore + biobank national ID or name), prefixed with bbmri-eric:networkID: string; if biobank network is on European or higher level, EU_ prefix is to be used instead of country prefix.

label: Name
description: Network name.

label: Acronym
description: Network acronym.

label: Description
description: Network description.

label: Location
description: The city where the network is located.

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the network in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the network in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Also Known In
description: The network is also known in …

label: URL
description: Network URL

label: Juridical Person
description: Juristic person of the network to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-05.

label: Contact Person
description: Contact person of the network.

label: Parent Network
description: Reference to a network ID, refers to the superior network.

label: Common Network Elements
description: Selection of elements that are the same for all biobanks/collections within the network.

label: Withdrawn
description: The network is withdrawn from the Directory.
Information of the contact persons of a biobank, collection of network, like name, address and e-mail address.

label: ID
description: Unique ID of the person, prefixed with bbmri-eric:contactID:

label: Title before Name
description: Title before name, values like "prof. mr."

label: First Name
description: First name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-A.

label: Last Name
description: Last name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-B.

label: Title after Name
description: Title after name, values like "Bsc."

label: Email address
description: Email address according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-D.

label: Phone Number
description: Phone number according to MIABIS 2.0 including international prefix (+99999999999 form with no spaces) compliant also to E.123 norm - MIABIS-2.0-07-C.

label: Address
description: Address according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-E.

label: Zip code
description: ZIP or postal code according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-F.

label: City
description: City according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-G.

label: Country
description: Country according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-H.

label: Role of the Person
description: Official role of the person.

label: Biobanks
description: Biobanks the person is connected to.

label: Collections
description: Collections the person is connected to.

label: Networks
description: Networks the person is connected to.
Table with information about the studies in which context the collection was generated

label: ID
description: Unique ID of the study, prefixed with bbmri-eric:studyID:<national_node>_<id_of_the_study>

label: Title
description: The title of the study

label: Description
description: A text describing the study

label: Type
description: The type of study (Observational, Interventional).

label: Sex
description: The sex of the individuals that participated to the study

label: Age Low
description: Age of youngest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-10.

label: Age High
description: Age of oldest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-11.

label: Age Unit
description: Unit defining Age Low and Age High. Can be one of the following values: YEAR, MONTH, WEEK, DAY - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: Number of subjects
description: The number of subjects that participated to the study

label: Also Known In
description: The study also exists in …
Biobank Capabilities and Services

label: ID
description: Unique ID of the service, prefixed with bbmri-eric:serviceID:

label: Service Name
description: Name of the service (preferably in English).

label: Service Types
description: Related service types

label: Acronym
description: Short name in use for the service. If applicable.

label: Description
description: Full description of the service (in English)

label: Description URL
description: URL address of the service description if available.

label: Device
description: Name of the device(s) if the service is provided with the use of them.

label: Device System
description: Name of a software system or platform if important for the device characteristics.

label: Technology Readiness Level
description: Technology Readiness Level - a concept for self-assessment of the service maturity

label: Access Description
description: Description of the access policy of the service.

label: Access Description URL
description: URL of the service access policy if available..

label: Unit of Access
description: Information about a standard unit used in calculations of costs of service provision.

label: Unit Cost
description: Cost per unit.

label: Contact Information
description: Contact information for the contact person or responsible person of the service

label: Biobank
description: Reference to a biobank ID, to which the service belongs.
